org.vanilladb.core.sql.predicate

Class BinaryArithmeticExpression

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vanilladb.core.sql.predicate.BinaryArithmeticExpression
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Expression

    public class BinaryArithmeticExpression
extends Object
implements Expression
    An expression consisting of a binary arithmetic operator and two sub-expressions as operands.
